H3.text: what religion does canada follow. Islam

A4.text: Christianity is the largest religion in Canada, representing 53.3 percent of the population as of the 2021 census.

A5.text: Canada has no official church and the government is officially committed to religious pluralism.

A7.text: Islam is the second-largest religion in Canada, practised by approximately 4.9% of the population.
